arts.ttl: Are Southampton on course to become Premier League's worst ever team?
arts.sum: BBC Sport looks at the numbers to see if Southampton could replace Derby County of 2007-08 as the Premier League's worst ever team.

arts.ttl: Glasner: The most important thing was to win
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says the result was the most important aspect of Crystal Palaceâ€™s 2-1 win over Southampton.

arts.ttl: Southampton, Ipswich Town to fight three Championship clubs for 64-cap international star in January?
arts.sum: Southampton and Ipswich are reportedly keen on the January signing of former Leeds United midfielder Glen Kamara, who is currently out of favour at French side Rennes.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner eager to see Eberechi Eze kick on after winning goal
Glasner 'really pleased' with win against Southampton
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner says he is 'really pleased' after his side came from behind to beat Southampton and move six points clear of the relegation zone in the Premier League.
Southampton boss Ivan Juric says his side conceded " really stupid goals" during their 2-1 defeat by Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Palace boss Glasner gives verdict on ending 2024 with win over Southampton
arts.sum: It was a far more challenging game than the Eaglesâ€™ Austrian manager Oliver Glasner may have liked, but having set a target of four points from this pair of post-Christmas fixtures, it is job well done for his team. â€œWe scored both our goals after set-pieces and we could have decided the game a bit earlier.

arts.ttl: 'At the last moment': Paul Robinson says VAR made a big mistake during Crystal Palace 2-1 Southampton
The lowdown on Crystal Palace 2 Southampton 1 - No classic but a much-needed win as Eagles pull further clear of bottom three
arts.sum: Palace boss Oliver Glasner said after the Bournemouth game that his team were targeting a minimum of four points from this pair of post-Christmas fixtures. From then on, the side expected to win was having to chase a match against the bottom team in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 2-1 Southampton: Eberechi Eze seals comeback win as Eagles move clear or relegation zone
arts.sum: Oliver Glasnerâ€™s side now six points clear of Leicester as fortunes change for the better
